attributes.action: Change the planning rules to allow your right to a view from your own home.
attributes.additional_details:
I petition the Government to change the planning rules regarding VIEWS,  which currently state, "you do not have the right to a view" to "homeowners whose homes have existed for several years with a view, shall be protected from any new development which would cause that view to be lost."

Developers / builders should not be allowed to come and build in such a position as to block, impair or disrupt the view that established homeowners have enjoyed and invested in for several years.
